attributes.action: REGULATE BAILIFF COMPANIES AND COMPANY DIRECTORS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Regulate bailiff companies and also to create a government watchdog who will monitor bailiff activity and also take action against scrupilous companies. Also that company directors are also regulated like the the security industy has been of recent date.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
